sentences.en: Both partners of the marriage wound up unhappy.
sentences.cn: 最后婚姻双方都不幸福。

sentences.en: Cats miaow when they are unhappy, purr when they are happy.
sentences.cn: 猫不高兴时会喵喵叫，高兴时会发出呜呜声。

sentences.en: Ferguson was unhappy and it showed.
sentences.cn: 弗格森很不开心，能看得出来。

sentences.en: He has been unhappy with his son's political leanings.
sentences.cn: 他一向不满意儿子的政治倾向。

sentences.en: He was shy and nervous as a boy, and unhappy at school.
sentences.cn: 他小时候既害羞又胆怯，在学校过得并不快乐。

sentences.en: He went about looking ill and unhappy.
sentences.cn: 他看上去总是一副病恹恹、不开心的样子。

sentences.en: Her marriage is in trouble and she is desperately unhappy.
sentences.cn: 她的婚姻陷入困境，她为此非常郁闷。

sentences.en: I could no longer ignore the fact that he was deeply unhappy.
sentences.cn: 我再不能对他深感不快这个事实不闻不问了。

sentences.en: I don't want him to feel forsaken and unhappy.
sentences.cn: 我不想让他感到被抛弃而不快乐。

sentences.en: I felt our engagement was quite an unhappy time.
sentences.cn: 我觉得我们订婚期间非常不愉快。

sentences.en: If you’re so unhappy, why don’t you change jobs?
sentences.cn: 你要是那么不开心，为什么不换个工作呢？

sentences.en: In truth, we were both unhappy.
sentences.cn: 事实上，我们俩都不快乐。

sentences.en: She had managed to exorcize these unhappy memories from her mind.
sentences.cn: 她终于把这些不愉快的记忆从头脑中抹掉了。

sentences.en: The legislation represents in itself an unhappy compromise.
sentences.cn: 这项立法本身就是勉强妥协的产物。

sentences.en: Unfair bosses and rude customers make us unhappy on the job.
sentences.cn: 不公正的老板和粗鲁的顾客让我们工作起来很不愉快。

trans.tran_cn: 不幸的，悲惨的，不快乐的，不恰当的，不凑巧的
